title: IDSPBRMaterial.EmissionEnergyNormalization
description: Gets or sets the emission energy normalization value for this material.
returns: True (1) to enable emission energy normalization, default false (0) to not
remarks:
For more information about this property:
Open https://dassaultsystemes-technology.github.io/EnterprisePBRShadingModel/spec-2025x.md.html in an internet browser, click CTRL-F and type "Normalize emission color" in the pop up. Click
Next result
repeatedly.
Search for "Emission energy normalization in materials" on the web.
